tourAgency.eventSubtitle: Advertise an event, either a private session, weekly repeating event or one time event.
tourAgency.weeklyEventLabel: Scheduled trips that happen on a weekly basis at the same time. For example Sunday morning hikes.
tourAgency.oneTimeEventLabel: Event that is scheduled for a certain date & time where people need to book. For example, jungle cruise party.
tourAgency.onDemandLabel: Events that can be booked on demand. For example dolphin tour.

artisanalProduct.productSubtitle: Advertise an item that can be bought.

cleaningService.serviceSubtitle: Advertise a service that clients can book.

petSitting.weeklyEventLabel: Scheduled event that happens on a weekly repeating basis. For example, Latin Tuesday nights

wellnessPractitioner.eventSubtitle: Advertise an event, either a private session, weekly repeating event or one time event.
wellnessPractitioner.weeklyEventLabel: An event that reoccurs on a weekly basis.
wellnessPractitioner.oneTimeEventLabel: A scheduled event that happens on a particular time and day where multiple people can participate. For example, Mountain top yoga retreat.
wellnessPractitioner.onDemandLabel: A one on one event that clients can book with you.

volunteer.eventSubtitle: Advertise weekly or one time event.
volunteer.weeklyEventLabel: An event that repeats on a weekly basis. For example, ocean clean Wednesdays.
volunteer.oneTimeEventLabel: An event that is scheduled for a certain date and time. For example, Pet shelter camp.

locationPermissionStatus.denied: Access to your location is denied :(
locationPermissionStatus.backgroundAccessDenied: Access to background location is denied :(
locationPermissionStatus.foreverDenied: Click the button then go to permissions->location and check `Always`
locationPermissionStatus.serviceOff: Phone's Location service is disabled / off :(

ios.foreground: We need to access your location while using the app. Please Click `Keep Only While Using` .
ios.background: We need to access your location even when the app is in background. Please change the location permissions on App's Settings to `Always Allow` .

foreground.android9: We need to access your location while using the app. Please Click `Allow` .
foreground.android10: We need to access your location while using the app. Please Click `KEEP AND DON'T ASK AGAIN` .
foreground.android11: We need to access your location while using the app. Please Click `WHILE USING THE APP` .

background.android9: We need to access your location even when the app is in background. Please Click  `Allow` .
background.android10: We need to access your location even when the app is in background. Please Click `ALLOW ALL THE TIME` .
background.android11: We need to access your location even when the app is in background. Please Click Give Permissions -> Permissions -> Location -> All the time.
